verses.translation: A questioner asked about a Penalty to befall-
The Unbelievers, the which there is none to ward off,-
(A Penalty) from Allah, Lord of the Ways of Ascent.

verses.arabic: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.translation: The angels and the spirit ascend unto him in a Day the measure whereof is (as) fifty thousand years:
verses.transliteration: TaAAruju almala-ikatu warroohuilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfasana

verses.translation: Therefore do thou hold Patience,- a Patience of beautiful (contentment).
They see the (Day) indeed as a far-off (event):
But We see it (quite) near.
The Day that the sky will be like molten brass,
And the mountains will be like wool,
And no friend will ask after a friend,

verses.arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: Though they will be put in sight of each other,- the sinner's desire will be: Would that he could redeem himself from the Penalty of that Day by (sacrificing) his children,
verses.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu lawyaftadee min AAathabi yawmi-ithin bibaneeh

verses.translation: His wife and his brother,
His kindred who sheltered him,

verses.arabic: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: And all, all that is on earth,- so it could deliver him:
By no means! for it would be the Fire of Hell!-
Plucking out (his being) right to the skull!-
Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).
And collect (wealth) and hide it (from use)!
Truly man was created very impatient;-
Fretful when evil touches him;
And niggardly when good reaches him;-
Not so those devoted to Prayer;-
Those who remain steadfast to their prayer;
And those in whose wealth is a recognised right.
For the (needy) who asks and him who is prevented (for some reason from asking);
And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment;

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: And those who fear the displeasure of their Lord,-
For their Lord's displeasure is the opposite of Peace and Tranquillity;-
And those who guard their chastity,

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except with their wives and the (captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (then) they are not to be blamed,
verses.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen

verses.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors;-
verses.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon

verses.translation: And those who respect their trusts and covenants;
And those who stand firm in their testimonies;
And those who guard (the sacredness) of their worship;-
Such will be the honoured ones in the Gardens (of Bliss).
Now what is the matter with the Unbelievers that they rush madly before thee-
From the right and from the left, in crowds?

verses.arabic: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss?
verses.transliteration: AyatmaAAu kullu imri-in minhum anyudkhala jannata naAAeem

verses.translation: By no means! For We have created them out of the (base matter) they know!

verses.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: Now I do call to witness the Lord of all points in the East and the West that We can certainly-
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqiwalmagharibi inna laqadiroon

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: Substitute for them better (men) than they; And We are not to be defeated (in Our Plan).
verses.transliteration: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wamanahnu bimasbooqeen

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about, until they encounter that Day of theirs which they have been promised!-
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoowayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allatheeyooAAadoon

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: The Day whereon they will issue from their sepulchres in sudden haste as if they were rushing to a goal-post (fixed for them),-
verses.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona mina al-ajdathi siraAAankaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoon

verses.arabic: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Their eyes lowered in dejection,- ignominy covering them (all over)! such is the Day the which they are promised!
verses.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhumtarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allatheekanoo yooAAadoon
